overview: A story of an apolitical police commissar who is using odd methods against the gangsters.
title: With Clean Hands

overview: A Puerto-Rican ex-con, just released from prison, pledges to stay away from drugs and violence despite the pressure around him and lead on to a better life outside of NYC.
tagline: He's got a good future if he can live past next week.
title: Carlito's Way

overview: This is the second silent (save for a song) slapstick comedy short about adventures of Worldly, Coward, and Fool. In a small hunting lodge three friends are making illegal moonshine. title: Bootleggers

overview: Two cunning and manipulative drifters venture into Farifield County, Connecticut looking to seduce wealthy and lonely housewives.
title: Slingshot

overview: A small-town newspaper editor risks everything to expose a corrupt sheriff.

overview: Story of a man named Sayan, that had to live through harsh 1990's and make tough decisions.

title: Dangan Runner

tagline: Six Stories. One Hope.

overview: Alex is going through a midlife crisis and it has become a very difficult time for him. overview: When Triad leader Hung's wife gives birth to a baby boy, Hung considers leaving the world of the gangsters. Despite this conflict, the two have nothing but respect for each other. However, they know deep down, that there are people waiting to get rid of Hung.

overview: This is the story of three gentle persons: Paul Rivers an ailing mathematician lovelessly married to an English émigré, Christina Peck, an upper-middle-class suburban housewife, happily married and mother of two little girls, and Jack Jordan, an ex-convict who has found in his Christian faith the strength to raise a family. overview: Two professional killers invade a small town and kill a gas station attendant, "the Swede," who's expecting them. overview: Assigned to a Vice squad, Detective Jane Tennison investigates a child murder and discovers a sinister link to the police.  Detective Chief Inspector Jane Tennison moves to a new district and is put in charge of a vice investigation instead of homicide. But soon a homicide case impinges on her new job when a very young male prostitute is murdered in the apartment of Vera Reynolds, a female impersonator. Soon Jane is on the trail of the boy's brutal young pimp (played by David Thewlis). But her investigation is complicated by the Old Boy's Network, which is spying on her and is more concerned with preventing scandal than bringing the villain to justice.
tagline: There's no discrimination in death.
title: Prime Suspect 3

overview: An urban hotel in London is a gathering and flash point for legal and illegal immigrants attempting to cobble together their lives in a new country. The immigrants include Senay, a Turkish woman, and a Nigerian doctor named Okwe who is working as a night porter at the hotel. The pair discover the hotel is a front for all sorts of clandestine activities. Their only wish is to avoid possible deportation. Okwe becomes more entangled in the goings on when he is called to fix a toilet in one of the rooms. He discovers the plumbing has been clogged by a human heart.
tagline: Every dream has its price.
title: Dirty Pretty Things

overview: Keong comes from Hong Kong to visit New York for his uncle's wedding. His uncle runs a market in the Bronx and Keong offers to help out while Uncle is on his honeymoon. One of those petty thugs in the local gang stumbles into a criminal situation way over his head.
tagline: No Fear. No Stuntman. No Equal.

overview: Law was a chauffeur for the rural tycoon Luk, and he was jailed for killing a major land owner in a car accident. It was rumored that Luk was behind the land owner’s death, which gave Luk a competitive edge in the native apartment development deal. When Law gets out of prison five years later, the world has changed. Luk’s corporation has grown more powerful, while Luk’s right-hand man Keung has his own agenda to pursue. But things take a surprising turn.  With the help of Law’s prison mate and computer whiz Joe, Law drugs Sean and his brothers in the drinks, then modify their mobile phones for wiretapping,  Joe gets acquainted with the materialistic single mom Eva, who turns out to have a dark history with both Law and Keung. Through the eavesdropping, Law realizes Keung’s ultimate plan, which may change Hong Kong’s land development forever.
title: Overheard 3
